name: DevRain Solutions
tagline: We build mobile, web and cloud solutions
description:
We build mobile and cloud solutions ...with a focus on simplicity and function
DevRain Solutions specialization is mobile and cloud development (Xamarin, iOS, Android, ASP.NET MVC, Microsoft Azure, Office 365, WPF, UWP, Windows Phone, UX/UI). We delivered numerous mobile applications, web sites and cloud solutions for startups, entertainment, bank, TV and enterprise brands. Providing a full stack development from the idea to publishing, as well as research & development, startups consulting, proof of concept and other services.
Our team members are experts at designing and developing intuitive desktop, mobile, tablet, wearable, TV experiences on Microsoft and iOS/Android platforms. We also use Xamarin for creating cross-platform applications for Google Play, Apple App Store.
DevRain Solutions was awarded as "Lead in mobile scenarios implementation on Windows Phone 8 platform" in 2013 by Microsoft Ukraine.
